member.name: T:XmobiTea.Crypto.ICryptoProvider
member.summary: Defines the interface for a cryptographic provider that supports encryption and decryption of data.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Crypto.ICryptoProvider.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Object)
member.summary: Encrypts the specified data using the provided salt.
member.param: The salt to use during encryption.
member.returns: The encrypted data as a byte array.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Crypto.ICryptoProvider.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Object)
member.summary: Decrypts the specified encrypted data using the provided salt.
member.param: The salt to use during decryption.
member.returns: The decrypted data as a byte array.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Crypto.ICryptoProvider.TryDecrypt(System.Byte[],System.Object,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Attempts to decrypt the specified encrypted data using the provided salt.
member.param: The salt to use during decryption.
When this method returns, contains the decrypted data if the decryption succeeded, or an empty byte array if it failed.
member.returns: True if decryption succeeded; otherwise, false.
